comment._content: A stark sort of picture but the chalked writing is beautifully done.

comment.author: 36891793@N08
comment._content: Fantastic photos that tell a lot about the people and the times they lived in. Shame we cannot post pictures like this of modern day criminals!

comment._content: You have an amazing collection of mug shots. I would love to use some in my work shown below. I would just have to credit Tyne & Wear Archives and Museum, as well as your sight?

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/alimarante] It was the good old days when people actually learned to write properly in schools.

comment._content: Thank you very much to the Tyne & Wear Archives & Museums for uploading these valuable and interesting images.
